coded_answer.p: I am so grateful and I can't believe I am so lucky to receivingreceive your letter in which you said that I have won the first prize in your competition, forof two weeks camping in California in the U.S.A.

I am writing to inform you that I can only go in July, the summer holiday, because I have got a place inat the university and it will start in August. Is there the time I request available? I would also like to ask accommodation you offer areis in tenstents or log cabins. If I can choose I would prefer tenstents. I like to sleep on open land and see the sun come up in the morning.
In addition, I choose painting and sailing for my activities. I cancan't wait to do my painting forof the rising sun, and can't imagine how wonderful sailing along the rivers will be.
Finally, can you tell me what kind of clothes I should bring with me, and how much spending money will be needneeded.
I look forward to hearing from you.

Shopping is not always enjoyable. I don't really like shopping. SometimeSometimes when I'm boringbored and can't find something else to do., I go look round the shops. When I see some clothes in the window I like, I would go in and try them on. But I always findsfind itthey do not look nice on me. The other thing I don't like going shopping is inat the weekend. All the shops are full of people, and people treat the articalsarticlesitems like rubbish. HangHanging, hanging them every whereeverywhere after they triedhave tried them on and found that they wasweredid not suit them.
Also inwith the weekend shopping. You, you do can't find some wheresomewhere to sit down comfortalycomfortably to have a cup of tea. Mc.Donnals, K.F.C, theare all full of people.
However, shopping is nicea nice way to spend youyour leisure time and give yourself a chance to relax sometimes, but I suggest that neveryou never do it inat the weekend.
